trans-unit.source: Associates an action taken on an activity designer on the workflow design surface with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將與工作流程設計介面上活動設計工具上採取的動作<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A designer action is a user action that is performed when you activate a designer glyph on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]設計工具動作是當您啟動工作流程設計介面上的設計工具圖像 （glyph） 會執行使用者動作。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerAction class is used to indicate your actions.
trans-unit.target: DesignerAction 類別用來指出您的動作。

trans-unit.source: The DesignerAction class is also used to add the task items by the adornment service.
trans-unit.target: DesignerAction 類別也會透過裝飾服務用來加入工作項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> class by using an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, an integer, and a string.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>類別使用<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>、 整數和字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the designer action is taken.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>上的設計工具不會採取動作。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the identifier of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示識別碼的整數值<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: 表示與設計工具動作關聯的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: activityDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityDesigner包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: text contains a null reference () or its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: text包含 null 參考 () 或其長度為 0。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> class by using <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>, an integer, a string, and an <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>類別使用<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>、 字串、 整數和一個<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> on which the designer action is to appear.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>於哪一個設計工具動作為會出現。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the identifier of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示識別碼的整數值<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: 表示與設計工具動作關聯的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>與設計工具動作關聯。

trans-unit.source: activityDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: activityDesigner包含 null 參考 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: text contains a null reference () or its length is 0.
trans-unit.target: text包含 null 參考 () 或其長度為 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier for the designer action.
trans-unit.target: 取得設計工具動作的識別項。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the identifier for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示的識別項<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the image associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設計工具動作關聯的影像。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>相關聯<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*> method of the activity designer associated with the current designer action.
trans-unit.target: 叫用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*>與目前設計工具動作關聯的活動設計工具的方法。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A> method is called when you click a validation error displayed by the activity designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A>呼叫方法時，您按一下工作流程設計介面上活動設計工具所顯示的驗證錯誤。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnExecuteDesignerAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of the property that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 表示屬性的名稱， <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>相關聯。

trans-unit.source: In the property editor, the property that corresponds to the PropertyName of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction> provides a visual cue that signals the presence of an associated <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.
trans-unit.target: 在屬性編輯器中，對應至<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>提供視覺提示，表示相關聯的<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>與否</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction>的 PropertyName 屬性

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含屬性的名稱。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設計工具動作關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: A string value that represents the text associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字串值，表示相關聯的文字<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a dictionary of user data associated with the designer action.
trans-unit.target: 取得與設計工具動作關聯的使用者資料字典。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> that represents the user data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>，代表相關聯的使用者資料<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
